topics.body:
IT'S OVER
IT'S FINALLY OVER

THAT FUCKING SHOW WAS
Alright

It certainly had problems, mostly with major problems, and not properly using characters and just having them say "Only Goku can do it"

But overall, the writing was fine, the action was fine

Honestly it's not a bad show
Just not as good as what came before
